about_the_game:
Take to the stars and harvest the ultimate ASTRALODE!


Launch clusters of mining tools into the gravitational pull of haphazardly spinning asteroids. Mine away their frozen exteriors and harvest the precious ore contained within, but be careful not to ruin the valuable lode with a badly aimed drill, bomb or Annihilazer™!

Engage in a variety of GAME MODES!

  • Arcade > Earn crazy high $core by harvesting ore from untamed, randomized asteroids. Fill your Atlas Mineralis with all the rare ore you find and bank your cash from session to session to unlock better mining vessels, new co-pilots & other extras!
  • Career > Build up your rank by completing challenging extraction contracts for the Mega Mining Consortium. Work your way around the galaxy, beat rival starminers to the juiciest spacerocks and manage your mining operations smartly to ensure a nice profit!
  • Puzzle > Clear deviously crafted asteroids through tactical application of the tool clusters provided. Flex your logic and sleuth out solutions to numerous brainteasing mining scenarios!

The Azimuth Starmining Co-op is thrilled to have you on board, Captain. Now go mine the heck out of those asteroids!
